paper_abstract: The planar Hajos calculus is the Hajos calculus with the restriction that all the graphs that appear in the construction (including a final graph) must be planar. We prove that the planar Hajos calculus is polynomially bounded iff the Hajos calculus is polynomially bounded. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The complexity of the Hajos calculus for planar graphs
